ComicInfo.Summary:
“AND SPOIL THE CHILD!” A general takes into custody a mutant child with the power to destroy things with his mind when he goes into fits of rage! Plus, “THE WENDIGO” and “HAIR APPARENT”
*Contents* ...And Spoil the Child! The Wendigo Hair Apparent! The ongoing story I... Vampire! does not appear; the story continues in the next issue.
